author: donaldp
msg: This fixes all grammar errors and typos in src/xdocs that I could find.

author: donaldp
msg: When the xdocs are generated, the links to Javadocs and other subproject
docs are all "http://jakarta.apache.org/avalon/..". I suppose that's
safe, because not everyone has generated local javadocs, or downloaded
the other subprojects, but it would be nice to at least let the user
This patch solves the problem (without upsetting the status quo) by
allowing the user to set Ant variables to specify where external docs
are located. Usually, this would be done in a .ant.properties, so I've

author: donaldp
msg: Fixed mind numbingly stupid bug that I had deliberately added in and forgot to back out ;) (The bug was resolving embedded exceptions).

author: donaldp
msg: Removed AbstractDeployer as it wasn't as useful as originally conceived. May re-add it in the future.
Removed CamelotUtil by merging in code to appropriate places.
